thread.section_title: InterContinental Paris Le Grand - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Historic Hotel
thread.title_full: Historic Hotel - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sheloves2laugh
title: Historic Hotel
text: Beautiful hotel with a just as grand history to match. Worth staying for any history buff. For the level of service, we did have a couple of hiccups with our room key, the huge size of the hotel made it a little more bothersome than it should have been (ie long walks to the front desk each time we ran into an issue with the key), but not enough of an annoyance to ruin the experience. Do make sure you stop by the ballroom when it's not in use, it's the highlight of the hotel!
